def candidate(n):
    # Calculate the square root of n
    sqrt_n = n ** 0.5
    
    # Round up to the nearest whole number
    next_sqrt = int(sqrt_n) + 1
    
    # Return the square of the rounded-up value
    return next_sqrt * next_sqrt
